lazymoney.setting.addConvert.name: Convert when adding money
lazymoney.setting.addConvert.hint: Automatically convert currency to higher denominations when adding money instead of the default behaviour of preserving the denominations you receive.
lazymoney.setting.ignoreElectrum.name: Ignore electrum
lazymoney.setting.ignoreElectrum.hint: When converting, ignore electrum. This won't affect directly adding or removing it, except in the case when "Convert when adding money" is also enabled.
lazymoney.setting.chatLog.name: Chat log
lazymoney.setting.chatLog.hint: Whisper any currency changes to the GM.
lazymoney.setting.reset.name: Reset settings to default
lazymoney.setting.reset.label: Reset Settings To Default
lazymoney.setting.reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.
lazymoney.setting.debug.name: Enable debugging
lazymoney.setting.debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console
lazymoney.dialogs.resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
lazymoney.dialogs.resetsettings.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!
lazymoney.dialogs.nosystemfound.title: System Not Recognized
lazymoney.dialogs.nosystemfound.content:
This system is not currently fully supported. This means that the module does not know how to best handle this system's items, but can still operate in a limited fashion.

You can configure the module's settings yourself, but it requires a bit of technical know-how.

If you have any questions, ping Wasp#2005 on the Foundry discord.
lazymoney.dialogs.systemfound.title: System Recognized
lazymoney.dialogs.systemfound.content:
This system was previously not supported, but in an recent update it was added as a supported system!

Do you want to load this system's default Item Pile settings?
